snippet: Rick Santorum tells South Carolina voters how important the state is to the future of his presidential bid.
abstract: Rick Santorum tells South Carolina voters how important the state is to the future of his presidential bid.
lead_paragraph: GREENVILLE, S.C. - Just two days before voting in the Republican nominating contest is to begin in New Hampshire, Rick Santorum turned his attention here on Sunday night, telling a crowd of several hundred who packed a sports bar that he is the candidate who most reflects their values as "a strong-conviction conservative."

headline.main: After Debate, Campaigning Turns to South Carolina
